title: About IEEE R8 SYP
content: The IEEE R8 Student and Young Professional congress is one of the most famous and important congresses of region 8. It’s organized every 2 years and gathers students and young professionals from all the sections of the Region8. It’s considered a good opportunity for IEEE Members to network and get to know over 400 people from over the world. During the Congress, a wide variety of workshops and lectures are organized, dealing with interesting topics in diverse technical fields and also related to soft skills. There are several social activities that give the participants the chance to know each other and interact with people with different identities.
